text: The New Mutants is a 2020 American superhero horror movie. It is the thirteenth film of the X-Men film series and it was released on August 28, 2020. The movie is directed by Josh Boone. It stars Anya Taylor-Joy, Maisie Williams, Charlie Heaton, Henry Zaga, Blu Hunt, and Alice Braga. == References == Category:American horror movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies produced by Lauren Shuler Donner Category:Movies produced by Simon Kinberg Category:X-Men (movie series) Category:2020 horror movies Category:2020s LGBT movies Category:2020s superhero movies Category:Superhero horror movies
title: The New Mutants (movie)
